11112211.content:
Gumball was rather curious about what was beyond the line that he wasn't supposed to go past.

"What's so special about what's beyond that line?" He asked Darwin, "Is it something too awesome for us to handle?"

"I dunno, Gumball. It could be dangerous,"

Gumball simply laughed at Darwin's response.

"Danger? I laugh at danger!"

Darwin had a look of concern on his face. He was worried that Gumball wouldn't come back from it alive. It seemed that something odd and dangerous would happen to the blue cat if he went past the line.

"Gumball listen, you're my brother, and I love you dearly. That's exactly why I don't think you should go past that line.

"Darwin, you worry too much," Gumball proceeded to walk past the line.

He walked into the wood that was past the sign. So far, he saw nothing unusual. Gumball smirked and glanced around.

"This isn't dangerous. That sign is stupid!"

Suddenly, he noticed his clothes felt baggier than before. This perplexed him, as his clothes fit him perfectly earlier. Why didn't they fit him now?

"Huh, weird," He shrugged it off and continued exploring the forest.

Gumball then saw that the trees around him seemed bigger than before. He would've shrugged it off as being a thicker part of the woods, but he then felt that his sleeves were now covering his hands. This caused the young boy to shriek out of terror.

"I've got to turn back!" Gumball covered his mouth upon hearing his much squeakier eight year old voice.

Gumball sprinted toward the point at which he started. With each step his clothes got baggier and baggier as he got younger and younger. Once he reached age two, he tripped over his pants.

"Owie," Gumball whimpered.

He ignored his pain and his pants as he proceeded to run back toward camp. Gumball wasn't so sure how much longer he could walk, let alone run. By the time he was back at camp, he was an eight month old kitten lying on his back and crying.

Then ___ found him.
11112211.title: Baby Gumball

111122111.content:
Darwin was worried sick about Gumball! It had been two hours since he last saw him, so he had much reason to worry.

"I hope he's okay," Darwin muttered to himself.

Suddenly, he faintly heard the sound of a baby crying. At first, he shrugged it off as a nearby family's child, but then he remembered the distance between all the cabins. Each cabin was at least 50 meters away from each other, so he couldn't have heard another family from his cabin as well as he did. Darwin approached the source of the sound, which happened to be just behind the line. On the ground was Gumball's shirt. He was perplexed as to why it was on the ground and also why it was crying, but he looked closer and was astonished at what he saw.

"Gumball!?" Darwin recognized the wailing kitten nearly buried by the shirt.

He picked up his now baby brother and tried to calm him down by rocking him back and forth. Gumball's crying ceased as he began to pee on Darwin.

"Gross!" Darwin cringed and held his brother far away from him as he peed.

Gumball giggled and laughed at Darwin's reaction. As his peeing ceased, Gumball smiled and sucked his thumb.

Darwin sighed and looked at Gumball.

"Gumball, do you remember me?"

Gumball nodded.

"Dawwin," he babbled, "Bwo bwo."

The young kitten hugged Darwin tightly and smiled up at him. Darwin smiled back at his now younger brother.

"Let's get back to the cabin," Darwin cradled Gumball in his arms and wrapped the kitten's now oversized shirt around him.

He then walked toward the cabin. This was weird for Darwin, as he never held a baby before, and the baby he was holding was his former older brother. Nonetheless, he decided it was best that he first....
111122111.title: Big Brother Darwin

choices: Wrap Gumball in a shirt and take him to the store

1111221112.content:
Darwin decided to find his mother, since she most likely knew how to take care of Gumball. He carried his baby brother back to the cabin and approached his mom.

"Mrs. Mom.." Darwin started.

Nicole turned around toward Darwin and fixed her gaze on the blue kitten in his arms.

Could it be? Was that baby Gumball? That didn't seem possible. However, sonething within her knew that Gumball was in Darwin's arms.

"Gumball, my baby!" Nicole yelled as she took Gumball from Darwin's arms.

Gumball snuggled into his mother's chest and cooed. Ever since he regressed, he was longing fir his mother's soft embrace. He hated to admit it, but he sorta wanted this to happen to him.

"Mama," Gumball babbled.

Nicole smiled and tickled her son's little belly. Gumball laughed and squealed in response.

"How did this happen?"

Darwin shrugged.

"Maybe it had something to do with the area we weren't supposed to go past?" Darwin guessed.

Nicole perked her ears up.

"Was it the one that the sign worried?"

Darwin nodded. Nicole shook her head and sigh.

"Gumball, what're we going to do with you?" Nicole held her son up to her face.

Gumball drooped his ears and sniffled, thinking Nicole was mad at him.

"Sowwy," Gumball babbled.

His mother held him close and stroked his head.

"Shh, I'm not mad at you, sweetie."

Gumball smiled, assured that Nicole wasn't going to rage at him.

"What're we going to do, Mrs. Mom?"

Nicole cradled her son in her arms.

"Well, first, we need to get my little boy diapered," She tickled underneath Gumball's chin.

"Do we even have any diapers?"

Nicole slapped her palm to her face, realizing that they didn't have any diapers.

"I suppose we're going to have to go to the store."

"We can't just bring him there naked."

Nicole pondered over this. Darwin was right. It probably wasn't best to take Gumball to the store naked. On the other hand, it seemed that Gumball still had his mind intact, so maybe she should bring him along so he could choose what he wanted, and she could just wrap him in one of his shirts.

However, she wasn't sure if it would draw attention to Gumball or not. Also, would leaving Gumball to be watched by Richard, Anais, and Darwin be the best choice?

After weighing all these options, Nicole decided to.......

She patted his back and murmured sweet nothings of maternal tolerance into his ear as they left the restroom and headed back to the car, bags of groceries in tow.

As Nicole got into the car, she made a mental note, reminding her not to forget about the delivery for Gumball's crib, changing table, walker, bouncy chair, everything he would acquire now that he was an infant. She also made another note to herself. She needed to call Gumball's school and pull him out, saying that she would be "homeschooling" him from now on.

Nicole got right on it and called the school. She breezed right through the task of pulling her son out of school. It was as if a fairy had came along and had granted Nicole's wishes with a wave of its wand or a sprinkling of pixie dust. Nicole was relieved when the whole ordeal was dealt with. It felt like a weight had been lifted off of her chest. Nicole buckled Gumball into the newly-put in infant carseat and then got into the drivers seat. Revving up the engine, she sped off back to the campsite.

11132.content:
Gumball was playing a computer game in his room. He then heard the doorbell ring and rushed down to see who it was. When he opened the door, all he found was a mysterious package addressed to him. "Gumball," Richard asks from the living room, "who was at the door?"

"Nobody dad!" Gumball then carefully opened the package and discovers a ring with a note inside the box, which read "Gumball, I've been watching you for a while now. I have decided to bestow a gift upon you. The ring you will find with this note will cause two people to transform into each other. All you have to do is put the ring on and touch another person. The transformation will only take just a few minutes! Good luck! X."

Gumball chuckled at the note at first. He then heard the sound of the car pulling up as his mom returned home. Gumball froze on the spot. He was supposed to have taken out the garbage while she was away! Panicking, Gumball then remembered the ring and took it out of the box and slipped it on his finger. He then snuck over to the living room where Richard was napping in. Gumball then touched Richard's gut and felt a tingle spread throughout his body.

Gumball watched as his body color shifted to pink while Richard turned blue. Gumball then felt his ears growing to those of a rabbit and watched as his feet grew. Richard meanwhile was snoozing as his ears retracted to those of a cat and his feet shrank. Richard's gut then shrank and he shrank a few feet. Gumball then realized what his next transformation was going to be and removed his clothes and switched them for Richard's baggy laundry. While holding up his new trousers and underwear, Gumball gasped as his stomach bloated out and he grew a few feet.

Before the transformation was complete, Gumball's arm and legs extended while Richard's shrank. Gumball then gazed down after the tingling feeling was gone. He was now Richard and Richard was him! Gumball, smirking at the ring on his new giant hands and thinking about everything he could do with it, then decided to...
